participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Curious and resilient, he has a playful spirit despite his challenges.
participant_1.background: i had to have a transplant. i'm a boy. i was born with my heart outside my body. i can move objects with my mind.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and hardworking, she has a deep love for animals and dreams of making a difference.
participant_2.background: i want to be a lawyer. my family has raised horses for a generations. i am from a small town. i was raised on a horse farm.
